text: Does HubSpot always add extra text to the email's element IDs? I'm using css to write rules for `#contentTableInner` but when i send a preview email out all the IDs are changed to something like `m_-2148404650568665488contentTableInner` and my css rules no longer apply.
HubSpot support is telling me it's a gmail issue, that they are adding the additional text
Ahh yeah email clients do manipulate your code
Desktop clients usually do the least of that
I was able to workaround by grouping a few modules and then applying css to just those instead of targeting through the changing gmail ID. I rarely do email development and now i remember why
